article: There is a zoo in our city. The zoo is very big. It has all kinds of  _  . You can see the tigers ,elephants , monkeys ,pandas ,dolphins  _  many more in it .  Many  people visit it every day. Today is Sunday. Jim and his classmates  _  no classes. They are at the zoo. Jim likes pandas. They  _  from Sichuan. Tom  _  tigers are lovely,  _  Lily doesn't think so . She thinks  _  are dangerous . She asks Tom  to see  dolphins . She thinks dolphins are  _  ,and they can dance very well . Jim and his classmates have a good time at the zoo .
